title: massive ping difference between PBE and normal client..
body:
on pbe... i have a very nice 28 ping (that somtimes spikes to 200)

were as  on live servers i have a constant 68 ping  (that sometimes spikes to 240)

now clearly the  ping spiking by 200 is my end, but i cant fix that as my dad controls the router settings

but... why is my PBE ping so much lower?

i know pbe is located at riot in irvine.. aka southern CA. which makes since as i am in northern CA bay area so 28 ping is expected with that distance.

but i thought riot ALSO had their main NA servers there as well...

why would my ping be a constant 40 ms higher on the live server?

replies.body: Live and PBE regions are separate servers, so your routing specifically to the PBE could be having issues.  I recommend trying the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Configuring your DNS could also change your routing as well.  You may need to hit up your dad, though, for some steps.  I hope that helps!

is the live server not in southern CA anymore?
i mean i know my ping went up to about 68 like 3 years ago when it used to be 28 on live as well. did they move the server from irvine?
